page.title: 06A local Character
page.content: MRS.QUEENIE HOOPER HAS BEEN TEACHING MUSIC IN THIS AREA FOR 54 YEARS,AND AT THE AGE OF 74 IS STILL GOING STRONG. SHE WAS BORN IN LITTLE DRYBROOK,AND HAS LIVED ROUND AND ABOUT THE AREA ALL HER LIFE.THE"FOREST"WAS FULL OF SMALL MINES WHEN SHE WAS A CHILD,AND HER FATHER WAS A MINER.HE WORKED ABOUT TWO MILES AWAY FROM HER HOME,AND SOMETIMES WHEN HEGOT TO WORK HE WAS TOLD THERE WAS NO WORK AND THEY WOULD ALL BE SENT BACK HOME,WITH NO PAY.FACTORIES HAVE BOUGHT WELL PAID JOBS AND MUCH BETTER CONDITIONS,AND SOME THING THAT HER FATHER NEVER HAD "PAID HOILIDAYS"MUSIC HAS BEEN HER LIFE SINCE SHE WAS 20 YEARS OLD AND IF WERE TO ASK ANY ONE IN THE VILLAGES WHO TAUGHT THEM MUSIC THE ANSWER WOULD PROBABLY BE MRS.HOOPER.
